title: Special Notice from CPC : Do NOT queue for Diesel; NO shortage of Petrol
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Ceylon Petroleum Corporation has requested the general public NOT to remain in queues at filling stations for Diesel on Wednesday (30) & Thursday (31).
CPC Chairman said that the ship carrying 37,500 MT of diesel was unable to unload on Tuesday (29) as planned.
He also added that the distribution of Petrol will proceed as usual without any shortages.
